text:
@WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump "On Monday, Pelosi said it was "not a good idea" for POTUS to be taking hydroxychloroquine, a drug that has not been proven to work against coronavirus, because it can pose a risk for people w heart conditions and he is "morbidly obese." 
Most Americans don't believe him anyway.
